Package com.camerontec.catalys.util.stats

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IAccumulator
    Describes an object that can keep a record of long value data.
    IHistogramStats
    Interface to be implemented by all histogram based accumulator.
    IStatisticalAccumulator
    Objects implementing this interface are able to return more detailed statistical information about the samples like standard deviation.
    IStats
    Interface to be implemented by all statistical accumulators.
    IStoringAccumulator
    Interfaces for accumulators that store values, thus providing the ability to calculate percentiles / the median.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Accumulator
    Simple implementation of IAccumulator.
    AggregatingStatisticalAccumulator
    This class is a implementation of IStatisticalAccumulator.
    BaseAccumulator
    Abstract base class for IAccumulator implementations.
    DataPoint
    Data point accumulated by an IAccumulator.
    HistogramAccumulator
    Accumulator based histogram implementation.
    IntervalCount
    Holds a count of the number of values that an IAccumulator accumulated which lay between start and start + range - 1.
    Percentile  
    PerformanceMeter
    This class is a simple measuring tool that starts a timer then calculates Transactions Per Second (TPS) based on the number of transactions and the elapsed time.
    StoringStatisticalAccumulator
    This class is a implementation of IStatisticalAccumulator.
